backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor for BharatSMM defining Service, SmmOrder, and OrderStatus types, seeding social media services, and managing orders, balances, and user profiles with authorization and blob storage mixins.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report confirming high-confidence deployment of the complete BharatSMM application, listing all relevant frontend and backend files and component dependencies.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON map of short descriptions for every frontend source file, serving as a reference summary of each file's purpose in the BharatSMM project.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS entry file defining OKLCH-based CSS custom properties for light and dark themes including background, foreground, sidebar, and chart colors.
frontend/index.html: HTML shell for the BharatSMM React app with dark mode class, favicon, SEO meta tags, and Open Graph/Twitter Card metadata.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component setting up TanStack Router with all app routes, QueryClient, ThemeProvider, auth gating via Internet Identity, and profile setup modal for new users.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Persistent sidebar layout component with navigation links, conditional admin panel link, sign-out button, and a responsive mobile menu toggle.
frontend/src/components/OrderStatusBadge: Pill badge component that maps each order status enum value (pending, processing, completed, etc.) to a color-coded styled span.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: A modal dialog component that collects a new user's name and email, then saves their profile via the `useSaveCallerUserProfile` mutation with loading and error feedback.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: A React hook that creates and caches an ICP backend actor (authenticated or anonymous) using TanStack Query, and invalidates dependent queries whenever the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides an `InternetIdentityProvider` and `useInternetIdentity` hook that manage Internet Identity authentication state (login, logout, identity persistence) via `AuthClient`.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Centralizes all TanStack Query hooks for the app, covering user profile, services, orders, balance, and top-up operations against the ICP backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Global stylesheet that defines Tailwind base/component/utility layers, imports Google Fonts, and sets up CSS custom properties for a dark navy theme with brand colors.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that mounts the React app wrapped with `QueryClientProvider` and `InternetIdentityProvider`.
frontend/src/pages/AddFunds.tsx: A page that displays the user's current wallet balance, a UPI QR code for payment, and a form with preset amount buttons to submit a top-up request.
frontend/src/pages/AdminDashboard.tsx: Admin-only dashboard page with tabs for managing service prices, updating order statuses, and adding balance to user accounts. Renders an access-denied screen for non-admins.
frontend/src/pages/Dashboard.tsx: User dashboard page displaying account stats (balance, total/in-progress/completed orders) and a table of the 5 most recent orders.
frontend/src/pages/LoginPage.tsx: Public login page showcasing BharatSMM features and a login button that triggers Internet Identity authentication.
frontend/src/pages/NewOrder.tsx: Order placement page where users select a service category and specific service, enter a link and quantity, and submit an order with real-time cost calculation and balance validation.
frontend/src/pages/Orders.tsx: Paginated orders list page for the authenticated user, with search filtering by service name, link, or order ID, and a responsive table showing order details and status badges.
frontend/src/pages/Profile.tsx: React page for viewing and editing the logged-in user's profile (name, email), with principal ID display and copy functionality, using TanStack Query hooks for data fetching and saving.
frontend/src/pages/Services.tsx: React page that lists all available social media marketing services with search and category filter controls, grouping results by platform category with color-coded badges.
frontend/src/utils/orderCalculations.ts: Utility functions for calculating order totals from price-per-1000 and quantity, and formatting numbers as INR currency strings or bigint balances.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for extracting URL parameters from both query strings and hash-based routes, with sessionStorage persistence helpers and a function to remove sensitive params from the URL hash.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining the BharatSMM design system: dark navy/brand color palette, Inter/Space Grotesk/JetBrains Mono font families, custom border radii, box shadows, and fade-in animation.
project_state.json: Project state tracking file (version 11) describing the BharatSMM SMM panel app's existing features, architectural notes, and current build goals including an admin dashboard for managing top-up requests and orders.
